program: Minor in Computer Science for Scientists
notes: Some courses are not offered every term.
Courses at levels 1000 and 2000 are offered in French and in English.
Some courses at levels 3000 and 4000 are not offered in French.
For the French course codes, refer to the French course sequence.
Courses with fewer than 10 registrants may be cancelled.
This program is designed to be combined with a major or honours specialization in the field of science.

courses: CSI3105 | Design and Analysis of Algorithms I
Elective | 3 units from CSI or SEG at 2000, 3000, or 4000 level
